content:
FHIR Vital Signs BP profile - http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/bp.html (snapshot view)- stipulates "For supporting observations such as Cuff size could use other datatypes such as CodeableConcept." at observation.value.

  1. Please confirm this means another separate Observation just for cuff size is needed. If this is not the case, how are implementers implementing cuff size along with BP measurements?
  2. Are folks implementing cuff size in the same BP Observation at Observation.valueCodeableConcept?
  3. Please provide an example if possible
    Thanks.
Cuff size cannot be in the same BP observation because an observation can have only one value, it must be a separate observation or maybe a component of the BP observation
Maybe this LOINC Panel could be used to represent the bp and related obsevations, including the cuff size: https://loinc.org/35094-2/
look at the vitals panel page for guidance:http://build.fhir.org/observation-vitalsigns.html
It's a component because it's not meaningful on its own - it's a qualifier of the blood pressure observation
